    • Method Detail

      • addItemAsync

        public static void addItemAsync(@NonNull
                                android.content.Context context,
                                @NonNull
                                java.lang.String buyableId,
                                @NonNull
                                java.lang.String buyableType,
                                double qty,
                                @NonNull
                                java.lang.String ccy,
                                @NonNull
                                java.lang.String cartId)
        Add a new item to an existing cart. This method is Asynchronous. The result is broadcast on AddItem#BROADCAST_ACTION the broadcast contains the status whether adding item to cart was Successful or not If Successful the bundle contains Id of the Cart Item Added.
        Parameters:
        context - required to make web service call
        buyableId - the id of the buyable to be added to the cart
        buyableType - the type of the buyable to be added to the cart
        qty - the amount of the buyable to be added to the cart
        ccy - the currency of the buyable to be added to the cart
        cartId - the id of the cart to which the buyable must be added

      • addItemSync

      • patchItemAsync

        public static void patchItemAsync(@NonNull
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  @NonNull
                                  java.lang.String itemId,
                                  @NonNull
                                  android.os.Bundle patch_params)
        Edit an item before buying it. This method is Asynchronous. The result is broadcast on PatchItem#BROADCAST_ACTION the broadcast contains the status whether patching the cart item was Successful or not If Successful the bundle contains Id of the Cart Item Patched.

      • patchItemSync

        public static void patchItemSync(@NonNull
                                 android.content.Context context,
                                 @NonNull

                                 @NonNull
                                 android.os.Bundle patch_params)
        Edit an item before buying it. This method is Synchronous
